responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[24F282B6434E981D3FBC5B9E3C7849C5]", "E338FAF94DABFAC6768A0281C33CB8CB", "As you watch the water shimmer, a fish stirs beneath the surface. Sleek, steely-scaled, half the size of your hand, it rises from the depths. Tiny bubbles trail from its lips like silver pearls. Cradled in its jaw is something unexpected: a glistening red and black faceted stone shines in the thing\'s mouth. It pauses there, almost as if it is offering the thing to you.")
name: ANV_FTUE_BF_0003_ANC_CeremonialPool_5_Response
